news.title: Joined MyMedicalHub International as AI Engineer
news.description: Started a new role as Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence at MyMedicalHub International Ltd., focusing on enterprise-grade AI applications for medical professionals.

news.title: New Research Paper Published in IEEE Access
news.description: Our latest work on mulberry leaf disease detection using CNN-based smart Android application has been published in IEEE Access.

news.title: Continuing Research at Qatar University
news.description: Continuing my research collaboration with Qatar University Machine Learning Group, working on medical image analysis and smart agriculture solutions.
